text: Giorgio Ballati (born 2 April 1946) is a retired Italian sprinter who won a bronze medal in the 4 × 400 m relay at the 1975 Mediterranean Games. He competed at the 1972 Olympics in the 400 m hurdles, but failed to reach the final. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male hurdlers Category:Olympic athletes of Italy Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Italy Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1975 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in athletics
title: Giorgio Ballati
